answerText: dynamic programming[10] Exhaustively searching all possible solutions for an optimum is knows as this type of search. These types of algorithms and mathematical methods are so named for their lack of cleverness as well as the amount of time and effort required.

subject: Science
question: Question: This method for solving programs in computer science utilizes a technique called memoization to skip over computations that have already been done. [10] Name this technique that optimizes solutions to problems that may have subproblem overlap by caching values. Pathfinding algorithms may use this technique to store paths while calculating better ones.
